thread.title: John Stamos surrenders to being charming in 'Grandfathered'
thread.title_full: John Stamos surrenders to being charming in 'Grandfathered'

title: John Stamos surrenders to being charming in 'Grandfathered'
text: > Entertainment John Stamos surrenders to being charming in 'Grandfathered' FILE - In this Aug. 6, 2015 file photo, actor John Stamos, from the new comedy "Grandfathered," poses for a portrait during the Fox 2015 Television Critics Association Summer Press Tour in Beverly Hills, Calif. Stamos plays a restaurateur and a content single guy who finds his self-absorbed life upended by the 20-something son he didn't know he had. There's a grandbaby, to boot. (Photo by Matt Sayles/Invision/AP, File)
